item.description:
Our Verne has never been to Webs. We did try last weekend, but Webs isn't open on Sundays. So we hit The Wool Pack & Fiber Loft on way back so the day wasn't a total bust.

We still must help her with this situation. I looked for sales or events but the Webs calender is quiet from October thru December. So let's just take a Saturday ride and check things out.

Meet at the Newington Barnes & Noble at 8:30.
item.name: Take Verne to Webs again?
